did.abstract: Collection consists of letters from Haderman to "Mary Lizzie," during the siege of Petersburg, Va. He discusses camp life, picket duty, and building forts and entrenchments, and describes the Union attack on Petersburg on April 2, 1865. He complains about Southern "secesh" ladies, and describes hangings of deserters and Confederate guerillas. He also describes raiding by Union troops.

bioghist.p: M. T. Haderman was a Union soldier in the 3rd United States Infantry Division, from Pennsylvania.
